Meall Garbh (Carn Mairg)

Hear pronunciation Press to hear pronunciation

Meall Garbh is one of the group of four rounded Munros on the north side of Glen Lyon, usually climbed with its neighbours. It lacks any distinctive form.

 You have not climbed Meall Garbh (Carn Mairg).

Region: Perthshire

Altitude: 968 metres

Users' Rating:
  • Currently 2.55/5
Rating: 2.6/5 (120 votes cast)

You must be registered and signed-in to vote

Detailed route description and map

Carn Mairg circuit from Invervar

Other routes and challenges

It is possible to ascend from the north, perhaps making use of the track up Glen Sassunn.

Walker-friendly accommodation in the area

Perthshire Hotels

Perthshire B&B

Perthshire Cottages

Perthshire Hostels
